snippet: Two former policemen in East Point, Ga., each face seven counts in the 2014 death of Gregory L. Towns Jr., 24.
abstract: Marcus Eberhart and Howard J Weems Jr, former police officers in East Point, Ga, are charged with felony murder in connection with 2014 death of Gregory L Towns Jr, who was repeatedly shocked with Taser devices while he was handcuffed.
lead_paragraph: Two former policemen in East Point, Ga., each face seven counts in the 2014 death of Gregory L. Towns Jr., 24.

headline.main: Ex-Officers in Georgia Charged in Death Linked to Taser
headline.print_headline: Ex-Officers Charged in Death Linked to Taser
